name: Super Alien Abduction
description:
The time has to come to invade earth and abduct all of your favorite memes! Use your beam to collect EVERYTHING and purchase upgrades from the cows. Travel as far as you can to get the best score before running out of fuel!

Super Alien Abduction was made in one week as an entry for the Opera GX Game Jam

Art/Code: Dead Unicorn

Sound/Music: Jabbu

Controls
  • Move: WASD
  • Abduction Beam: Space Bar
  • Input: Enter/Space Bar
Social

If you enjoyed my game and would like to support me, feel free to follow me on social media or leave a donation on one of my games :)
